title: @Rioters question
body:
There are tons of threads flying around complaining about the death recap (and to be fair the one we got right now simply is bad most of the time, even if its not bugged) but deathrecap could be a great tool for every summoner.
I would just like to ask if you have People working at that problem. If u are planning on "repairing" it anytime soon or even giving us a brand new awesome one. Or do you not really see anything new in that area that for the next few seasons?
I realize its not really high priority but just knowing that u guys are not ignoring  it for the sake of other content and that we can expect something in like 1 or 2 seasons, or if its gonna take longer than that.
